description:
These thin socks provide a lightweight barrier between you and your shoes. The breathable and wicking fabric keep you cool and supported as you push through the kilometers.

  • Fabric blend wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry
  • Quarter height offers more protection in high friction areas and pairs well with mid-height trail runners
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
  • Mesh venting panels
  • Seamless toe closure and engineered ankle protection for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
name: Stance Run Light Quarter Socks - Unisex
